```{r importExcel}
data <- read.table("D:/Desktop/Machine Learning/Multivariate Statistics/First Group Assignment/T1-9.dat",header = FALSE)
data

```

```{r description}
data <- data[,-1]
means <- vector()
sds <- vector()
for (i in colnames(data)){
  means <- c(means,mean(data[,i]))
  sds <- c(sds, sd(data[,i]))
  
}
print(means)
print(sds)
```

```{r graphing}
ggplot2::ggplot(data = data)
```
